title: Liam Gallagher hints at reunion with Noel after revealing ex-Oasis star is invited to wedding

Ex-Oasis stars Liam Gallagher and Noel Gallagher might be finally putting their long-standing feud to rest.

Liam, 46, recently announced his engagement to his partner of six years, Debbie Gwyther.

He allegedly proposed to the 37-year-old, who is his former PA, on holiday in Italy.

He was responding to a fan on Twitter , who asked "Is Noel invited to the wedding?"

Liam replied "Of course him and his family".

(Image: Instagram)

But the former Oasis frontman couldn't resist the opportunity for another dig at Noel.

When asked if he thought Noel and his wife would turn up, Liam retorted "Him n his Mrs would turn up to the opening of an envelope".

The warring brothers' famous feud has been going on for years, with the latest drama including Liam calling his brother a "massive c****" on Twitter.

(Image: WireImage)

Liam was responding to rumours about an Oasis musical being on the cards.

Noel had said that a musical about the band was "inevitable", but Liam didn't appear to agree.

He angrily tweeted to his 3.1 million followers his idea of the how the plot should go.

He wrote "Oasis the musical, five lads from Manchester start a band and take on the world.

(Image: Getty)

"The little one who writes the songs turns into a massive c**t, sacks everyone except his little brother as he ain't got the a**e, splits up the band.

"There's a story like for ya, THE END LGx."

He also recently suggested while talking to Chris Moyles on his Radio X show that Noel was "hiding in a cupboard somewhere in a really dark room" on the ten-year anniversary of the band's split.

(Image: Getty)

Chris laughed "Liam, it's been ten years!"

Liam replied "I know. It's terrible man. I feel the pain."

Maybe it's time they buried the hatchet and celebrated Liam's big day together?
description: Liam Gallagher has hinted that a reunion may be on the cards for him and Noel, as he has invited his brother to his wedding
